channel.title: Not working dragonscape 525 client
channel.description:
im on my server and go into dragonscape 525 client and i get an error
java.lang.NullPointerException at org.jvnet.substance.SubstanceRootPaneUI.setMaximized(SubstanceRootPaneUI.java:656) at org.jvnet.substance.SubstanceRootPaneUI.installWindowListeners(SubstanceRootPaneUI.java:296) at org.jvnet.substance.SubstanceRootPaneUI.installClientDecorations(SubstanceRootPaneUI.java:546) at org.jvnet.substance.SubstanceRootPaneUI.propertyChange(SubstanceRootPaneUI.java:727) at java.beans.PropertyChangeSupport.firePropertyChange(Unknown Source) at java.beans.PropertyChangeSupport.firePropertyChange(Unknown Source) at java.beans.PropertyChangeSupport.firePropertyChange(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Component.firePropertyChange(Unknown Source) at javax.swing.JComponent.firePropertyChange(Unknown Source) at javax.swing.JRootPane.setWindowDecorationStyle(Unknown Source) at javax.swing.JFrame.frameInit(Unknown Source) at javax.swing.JFrame.<init>(Unknown Source) at client2.<init>(client2.java:97) at client2.main(client2.java:31)
